It's the result of ripening karma.
Once it's ripened, then...
It can't bring about the ripening of other births.
If there's ripening, then...
It also brings about other births.
The rest also bring about the rest.
There should be no liberation.

source_sentence: 說一切有部順正理論卷第二十九
translation: Saṃyuktâgama-śāstra, vol. 29
